description: Sử dụng Present Perfect với 'for' (khoảng thời gian) và 'since' (mốc thời gian)

questions.question: I have lived here _____ 2010.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mốc thời gian cụ thể (2010)

questions.question: She has worked in this company _____ five years.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (five years)

questions.question: How long _____ you been learning English?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'have' với chủ ngữ 'you' trong câu hỏi Present Perfect

questions.question: They haven't seen each other _____ last summer.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mốc thời gian (last summer)

questions.question: He has been a teacher _____ 2015.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước năm cụ thể (2015)

questions.question: We have known him _____ a long time.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (a long time)

questions.question: _____ have you been waiting here?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'How long' để hỏi về thời gian kéo dài

questions.question: I _____ met him before.
questions.explanation: Trật tự: have + never + V3

questions.question: She has lived in London _____ three months.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (three months)

questions.question: They have been married _____ 2000.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước năm cụ thể (2000)

questions.question: How long _____ she known about this?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'has' với chủ ngữ 'she'

questions.question: We haven't eaten anything _____ breakfast.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mốc thời gian (breakfast)

questions.question: I have studied English _____ I was 10 years old.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mệnh đề chỉ mốc thời gian

questions.question: He has worked here _____ many years.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (many years)

questions.question: How long have you _____ this car?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'had' (V3 của have) để nói về sở hữu

questions.question: They have been friends _____ childhood.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mốc thời gian (childhood)

questions.question: She _____ been here since morning.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'has' với chủ ngữ 'she'

questions.question: I haven't seen him _____ ages.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' với 'ages' (khoảng thời gian dài)

questions.question: We have lived in this house _____ we got married.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mệnh đề chỉ mốc thời gian

questions.question: How long have they _____ English?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'been V-ing' cho hành động kéo dài đến hiện tại

questions.question: He has played football _____ he was a child.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mệnh đề chỉ mốc thời gian

questions.question: I have known her _____ two years.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (two years)

questions.question: They _____ been waiting for an hour.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'have' với chủ ngữ 'they'

questions.question: She hasn't called me _____ last week.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mốc thời gian (last week)

questions.question: How long has it _____ raining?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'been' (V3 của be) trong Present Perfect Continuous

questions.question: We have been here _____ 9 o'clock.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mốc thời gian cụ thể (9 o'clock)

questions.question: I have worked in this field _____ a decade.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (a decade)

questions.question: _____ long have you been studying here?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'How long' để hỏi về thời gian kéo dài

questions.question: He has been sick _____ Monday.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước ngày cụ thể (Monday)

questions.question: They haven't traveled _____ several months.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (several months)

questions.question: She _____ lived here since 2018.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'has' với chủ ngữ 'she'

questions.question: I have been learning Spanish _____ six months.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (six months)

questions.question: How long have you _____ in this city?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'been living' cho hành động kéo dài đến hiện tại

questions.question: We haven't met _____ Christmas.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước dịp lễ cụ thể (Christmas)

questions.question: He has been a doctor _____ 10 years.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (10 years)

questions.question: They have known each other _____ they were children.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mệnh đề chỉ mốc thời gian

questions.question: _____ have they been married?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'How long' để hỏi về thời gian kéo dài

questions.question: I haven't slept well _____ days.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (days)

questions.question: She has worked here _____ she graduated.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mệnh đề chỉ mốc thời gian

questions.question: We have been waiting _____ an hour.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (an hour)

questions.question: How long has he _____ this problem?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'had' (V3 của have)

questions.question: They haven't spoken _____ their argument.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước sự kiện cụ thể (their argument)

questions.question: I have been interested in music _____ I was young.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mệnh đề chỉ mốc thời gian

questions.question: She _____ studied French for three years.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'has' với chủ ngữ 'she'

questions.question: We have lived here _____ a very long time.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (a very long time)

questions.question: How long have you _____ playing tennis?
questions.explanation: Dùng 'been' trong Present Perfect Continuous

questions.question: He hasn't eaten anything _____ yesterday.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước mốc thời gian (yesterday)

questions.question: They have been together _____ many years.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'for' trước khoảng thời gian (many years)

questions.question: I _____ been working here since January.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'have' với chủ ngữ 'I'

questions.question: She hasn't visited us _____ her birthday.
questions.explanation: Dùng 'since' trước sự kiện cụ thể (her birthday)
